query.query: {"measures":[["avg","YoY"],["sum","Amount"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<opportunity>\"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; b = filter a by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year\"..\"current day\"]; c = filter a by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"1 year ago\"..\"current day - 1 year\"]; d = group b by all full, c by all; d = foreach d generate coalesce((coalesce(sum(b['Amount']), 0) - coalesce(sum(c['Amount']), 0)) / coalesce(sum(c['Amount']), 0), 0) as 'avg_YoY', coalesce(sum(b['Amount']), 0) - coalesce(sum(c['Amount']), 0) as 'sum_Amount'; fake = load \"<opportunity>\"; fake = group fake by all; fake = foreach fake generate 0 as 'avg_YoY', 0 as 'sum_Amount'; final = union d, fake; final = group final by all; final = foreach final generate sum('sum_Amount') as 'sum_Amount', sum('avg_YoY') as 'avg_YoY';","autoFilter":true,"groups":[],"dimensions":[],"order":[]}

{"measures":[["sum","QoQ"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<opportunity>\"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; a = group a by ('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Quarter'); a = foreach a generate 'CloseDate_Year' + \"~~~\" + 'CloseDate_Quarter' as 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Quarter', ((sum('Amount') / sum(sum('Amount')) over([ - 4.. - 4] partition by all order by ('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Quarter'))) - 1) as 'sum_QoQ'; a = offset a 4;","autoFilter":true,"groups":[["CloseDate_Year","CloseDate_Quarter"]],"dimensions":[],"order":[]}

{"measures":[["sum","finalcf",null,{"display":" "}]],"pigql":"a = load \"<opportunity>\"; a = foreach a generate (case when coalesce( {{column(kpi_yoy_percent_and_diff.result, [\"sum_Amount\"]).asObject() }}, 0) > 0 then \"#3CAF6D\" when coalesce( {{column(kpi_yoy_percent_and_diff.result, [\"sum_Amount\"]).asObject() }}, 0) < 0 then \"#D4504C\" else \"#7D98B3\" end) as 'RAG'; a = group a by 'RAG'; a = foreach a generate 'RAG' as 'RAG', 0.95 as 'sum_finalcf';","groups":["RAG"],"order":[]}

{"pigql":"opp = load \"<opportunity>\"; opp_this_year = filter opp by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year\"..\"current day\"]; opp_this_year = filter opp_this_year by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; opp_this_year = group opp_this_year by 'Account.BillingCountry'; opp_this_year = foreach opp_this_year generate sum('Amount') as 'Amount', sum('Amount') as 'ThisYear', 'Account.BillingCountry' as 'Account.BillingCountry'; opp_this_quarter = filter opp by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current quarter\"..\"current day\"]; opp_this_quarter = group opp_this_quarter by 'Account.BillingCountry'; opp_this_quarter = foreach opp_this_quarter generate sum('Amount') as 'ThisQuarter', 'Account.BillingCountry' as 'Account.BillingCountry'; opp_last_quarter = filter opp by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"1 quarter ago\"..\"current day - 1 quarter\"]; opp_last_quarter = group opp_last_quarter by 'Account.BillingCountry'; opp_last_quarter = foreach opp_last_quarter generate sum('Amount') as 'LastQuarter', 'Account.BillingCountry' as 'Account.BillingCountry'; opp_last_year = filter opp by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"1 year ago\"..\"current day - 1 year\"]; opp_last_year = group opp_last_year by 'Account.BillingCountry'; opp_last_year = foreach opp_last_year generate sum('Amount') as 'LastYear', 'Account.BillingCountry' as 'Account.BillingCountry'; aggr = cogroup opp_this_year by 'Account.BillingCountry' full, opp_this_quarter by 'Account.BillingCountry' full, opp_last_quarter by 'Account.BillingCountry' full, opp_last_year by 'Account.BillingCountry'; aggr = foreach aggr generate coalesce(opp_this_year['Account.BillingCountry'], coalesce(opp_this_quarter['Account.BillingCountry'], coalesce(opp_last_quarter['Account.BillingCountry'], opp_last_year['Account.BillingCountry']))) as 'Account.BillingCountry', coalesce(sum(opp_this_year['Amount']), 0) as 'Amount', coalesce(sum(opp_this_quarter['ThisQuarter']), 0) as 'ThisQuarter', coalesce(sum(opp_last_quarter['LastQuarter']), 0) as 'LastQuarter', coalesce(sum(opp_this_year['ThisYear']), 0) as 'ThisYear', coalesce(sum(opp_last_year['LastYear']), 0) as 'LastYear'; aggr = filter aggr by 'Account.BillingCountry' is not null; q = foreach aggr generate 'Account.BillingCountry' as 'Account.BillingCountry', 'Amount' as 'sum_Amount', coalesce(coalesce(sum('ThisQuarter') - sum('LastQuarter'), 0) / coalesce(sum('LastQuarter'), 0), 0) as 'sum_QoQ', coalesce(coalesce(sum('ThisYear') - sum('LastYear'), 0) / coalesce(sum('LastYear'), 0), 0) as 'sum_YoY'; q = filter q by 'sum_QoQ' is not null; q = filter q by 'sum_YoY' is not null; q = order q by {{cell(step_grouping.selection, 0, \"order\").asObject()}} desc;","measures":"{{cell(step_grouping.selection, 0, \"measure\").asObject()}}","autoFilter":true,"groups":["Account.BillingCountry"]}
